summary: Austin is the capital of Texas and a bustling city known for its music and technology. It's the 11th largest city in the U.S. and has been growing rapidly since 2010. The city is famous for live music, earning it the nickname "Live Music Capital of the World." Many tech companies are based here, earning another nickname, "Silicon Hills." Austin is also home to the University of Texas, a major educational institution. The city's population is diverse, including students, musicians, tech workers, and government employees.
title: Austin, Texas
